content:
No worries about the accidental "thanks" reaction. I'm just happy to help and provide useful information.

I'm glad to hear that your parents still had a great time despite feeling tired. It's wonderful that they were able to experience the beauty of Europe with you and your brother.

I'm thrilled that you find the tips helpful! Patagonia can be a challenging destination, but with some planning and preparation, you'll be well-equipped to handle the terrain and make the most of your trip.

If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask. I'm here to assist you in planning an unforgettable adventure in Patagonia.

By the way, have you considered any specific activities or experiences you'd like to have in Patagonia beyond hiking in Torres del Paine and visiting the Perito Moreno Glacier?
